tool.help:
**MuSE sump**, takes as input the output file from ‘MuSE call’ and the dbSNP file. More information at MuSE: http://bioinformatics.mdanderson.org/main/MuSE
Galaxy wrapper for MuSE sump implements all options available through the command line.Supported options are described below.
Usage: MuSE sump [options] Options: -I FILE single input file generated by 'MuSE call' -G input generated from whole genome sequencing data -E input generated from whole exome sequencing data -O STR output file name (VCF format) -D FILE dbSNP vcf file that should be bgzip compressed, tabix indexed and based on the same reference genome used in 'MuSE call'
